WorkItem.Description: Looking at 2H weapons, they're unable to have damage numbers in excess of 2K. Reset my item caches and that didn't help. Gotta be hurting calculating damage.

Comments.Message: Do you mean that you enter the item editor and cannot physically set a number in the min or max damage boxes that is greater then 2000? What is the highest number you can enter?

Yes you are unable to enter higher numbers than 2000. The Up and Down arrows do not work either. I checked the some cached weapons and they are capped at 2K damage as well. I was trying to figure out why the identical 3.6 and 3.8 haste/mastery 2Hs did not have the 3.8 as the better weapon and stumbled upon it. As a side issue I only looked in this at the DPS Warrior module.
